Uses of Class
uk.ac.ebi.uniprot.dataservice.client.alignment.blast.BlastInput.Builder

  • Packages that use BlastInput.Builder 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.ebi.uniprot.dataservice.client.alignment.blast  

    • Uses of BlastInput.Builder in uk.ac.ebi.uniprot.dataservice.client.alignment.blast

      Methods in uk.ac.ebi.uniprot.dataservice.client.alignment.blast that return BlastInput.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.addDatabase(DatabaseOption database)
      Add an extra blast database to blast against.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.usingBlastVersion(BlastVersionOption blastVersion)
      The BLAST program to be used for the blast.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withDropOff(DropOffOption dropOff)
      The amount a score can drop before gapped extension of word hits is halted.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withExpectation(ExpectationOption expectation)
      Limits the number of scores and alignments reported based on the expectation value.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withFilter(FilterOption filter)
      Filter regions of low sequence complexity.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withGapAlign(boolean gapAlign)
      This is a true/false setting that tells the program the perform optimised alignments within regions involving gaps.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withGapExt(int gapExt)
      Penalty taken away from the score for each base or residue in the gap.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withGapOpen(int gapOpen)
      Penalty taken away from the score when a gap is created in sequence.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withMatrix(MatrixOption matrix)
      Enumeration for all possible selections for similarity matrizes used for the BLAST service.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withMaximumNumberOfAlignments(AlignmentCutoffOption cutoff)
      Maximum number of match alignments reported in the result output.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withMaximumNumberOfScores(ScoreCutoffOption cutoff)
      Maximum number of match alignments reported in the result output.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withSequenceRange(int start, int stop)
      Specify a range or section of the input sequence to use in the search.
      BlastInput.Builder BlastInput.Builder.withSequenceType(SequenceTypeOption sequenceType)
      Indicate whether the sequence to blast is from DNA/RNA or a protein.
